generator.title: Random Horse Generator
generator.subtitle: Generate horses with scientifically accurate genetics
generator.instructions:
**Instructions:**
1. Choose how many horses you want to generate (1-10)
2. Click **Generate Horses** button
3. View your new horses below
4. All generated horses are automatically saved to **My Stable**

**Tip:** Generate multiple horses at once to quickly build your breeding stock!
generator.tip: Tip: Generate multiple horses to build your stable!
generator.welcome: Welcome! Generate your first horse to get started.

breeding.title: Breeding Simulator
breeding.subtitle: Breed two horses and discover their offspring
breeding.instructions:
**Instructions:**
1. Select a **Sire** (father) from the left dropdown
2. Select a **Dam** (mother) from the right dropdown
3. Click **Breed Horses** to create offspring
4. The foal will be added to **My Stable** and **Pedigree Tree**

**Genetics:** Each parent contributes one random allele from each gene to the offspring.
Results follow real Mendelian inheritance patterns!
breeding.need_horses: You need at least 2 horses to breed. Visit the **Generator** page first!
breeding.congratulations: Congratulations! A new foal has been born!

probability.title: Probability Calculator
probability.subtitle: Calculate breeding outcome chances before you breed
probability.instructions:
**Instructions:**
1. Select two horses from the dropdowns
2. Click **Calculate Probabilities**
3. View the probability distribution of all possible offspring colors

**What does this show?** This calculates ALL possible genetic combinations from breeding
these two horses and shows you the exact probability of each color outcome.

**Tip:** Use this before breeding to see what colors are possible!
probability.need_horses: You need at least 2 horses. Visit the **Generator** page first!

stable.title: My Stable
stable.subtitle: Manage your horse collection
stable.instructions:
**Instructions:**
- **Save Stable:** Download all horses as a JSON file
- **Load Stable:** Upload a previously saved JSON file
- **Clear Stable:** Remove all horses (cannot be undone!)
- **Rename Horses:** Click on any horse and edit its name at the bottom

**Tip:** Regularly save your stable to keep backups of your breeding work!
stable.no_results: No horses match your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
stable.empty_stable: Your stable is empty. Visit the **Generator** to create horses!

compare.title: Horse Comparison
compare.subtitle: Compare two horses genetically side-by-side
compare.instructions:
**Instructions:**
1. Select two horses from the dropdowns below
2. View their phenotypes, genotypes, and genetic differences
3. See which genes match and which differ between the horses

**What you'll see:**
- **Phenotypes** - Visual appearance of each horse
- **Full Genotypes** - Complete genetic makeup
- **Gene Comparison** - Side-by-side view of each gene
- **Differences** - Highlighted genes where horses differ

**Tip:** Use this to plan breeding or understand genetic diversity!
compare.need_horses: You need at least 2 horses to compare. Visit the **Generator** page first!

pedigree.title: Pedigree Tree
pedigree.subtitle: Explore family relationships and breeding history
pedigree.instructions:
**Instructions:**
1. Select a horse from the dropdown menu
2. Choose how many generations back to display (1-5)
3. View the visual family tree showing all ancestors

**What you'll see:**
- **Parents** (1 generation back)
- **Grandparents** (2 generations back)
- **Great-Grandparents** (3 generations back)
- **Inbreeding warnings** if the same ancestor appears multiple times

**Note:** Only horses bred using the Breeding page appear in the pedigree tree.
Foundation horses (randomly generated) have no ancestors.
pedigree.no_data: No pedigree data yet. Breed some horses first using the **Breeding** page!
pedigree.how_to_build:
**How to build a pedigree:**
1. Go to **Generator** and create some foundation horses
2. Go to **Breeding** and breed two horses together
3. The offspring will appear here with full pedigree information
pedigree.choose_horse: Choose a horse to view its pedigree
pedigree.inbreeding_detected: **Inbreeding detected!** {count} ancestor(s) appear multiple times in the pedigree.
pedigree.no_inbreeding: **No inbreeding detected** - This is a diverse pedigree!
pedigree.foundation_horse: **Foundation Horse** - This horse was randomly generated and has no ancestors in the pedigree.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Horse Genetics Simulator v2.1
about.genetics_description: This simulator models **9 genetic traits** based on peer-reviewed equine genetics research:
about.genetics_6: **Champagne (Ch/n)** - Dilutes both red and black pigment
about.mendelian_description:
Each parent contributes one random allele from each gene to the offspring.
Complex gene interactions are modeled accurately based on scientific literature.
about.colors_cream:
**Cream Dilutes:**
- Palomino, Buckskin, Smoky Black
- Cremello, Perlino, Smoky Cream
about.colors_pearl:
**Pearl Colors:**
- Apricot, Pearl Bay, Smoky Pearl
about.colors_special:
**Special Combinations:**
- Silver Dapple, Champagne variants
- Dun colors, Flaxen variations
- Gray and many more!
